name: Huntik: Titan Defence
description: Huntik: Titan Defence is an app game based on Huntik: Secrets & Seekers released on September 26, 2010. The game features a six-chapter story mode throughout which the player must defend Eathon Lambert's journal from the advancing Titans of the Organization. There is also a challenge mode which enables the player to complete different achievements, and help them unlock new and more powerful Titans, and earn badges.
